Texts.Chs: 万分感谢！我会保证我的父亲会奖赏你的！
Texts.Eng: A thousand thanks! I will ensure that my father rewards you appropriately for your heroic efforts!

Texts.Chs: 蔻塔公主被幕府武士雇佣的忍者绑架了，你能顺利救她回来吗？
Texts.Eng: Ninjas in the employ of Shogun Takeshi have kidnapped the hylotl princess Koto. Are you a bad enough dude to rescue the princess?

Texts.Chs: 去往武士之城解救蔻塔公主！
Texts.Eng: Storm Castle Takeshi and save Princess Koto!
